segments.text: I hear the sound of water running steadily, a comforting background noise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I see the water spilling over the sink and feel disgusted by the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman remains fixated on her plate, blissfully unaware of the chaos she's creating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me think about how easily we can get lost in our routines.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the children working together, but at what cost?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their potential for injury just hangs in the air, thick and palpable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish they would see the risks instead of just the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
